鰦鰦鰦

鰦字的基本解释

鰦
zī
古书上说的一种黑色的鱼。

鰦字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zī］
［《廣韻》子之切，平之，精。］
鱼名。又名黑鰦。

鰦字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【魚字部】　鰦； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页1476第01
【廣韻】子之切【集韻】津之切，?音茲。魚名。【爾雅·釋魚】鮂，黑鰦。【註】卽白鯈魚。【疏】鮂，一名黑鰦。【六書故】今之鹹淡水中者，長不踰尺，搏身椎首而肥，俗謂之鰦。海亦有之。

考證：〔【六書故】今之鹹淡水中者，長不踰尺，搏身推首而肥，俗謂之鰦。〕　謹照原文搏身推首改搏身椎首。
鰦字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鰦字的起名意思

暂无。

鰦
Basic explanation of words
鰦
zī
A black fish mentioned in ancient books.
鰦
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zī］
["Guangyun" sub-cut, flat, refined. ]
The name of the fish. Also known as black 鰦.
鰦
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Fish Character Department] 　鰦; Kangxi Strokes: 21; Page Number: Page 1476 No. 01
[Guang Yun] Zi Zhi Qi [Ji Yun] Jin Zhi Qi,? Yin Zi. The name of the fish. 【Erya·Shiyu】鮂, black 鰦. [Note] White minnow. 【Sparse】Li, a black man. [Six Books] Today's people in brackish water are no more than a foot long, and they are fat by fighting the head of the body, which is commonly known as 鰦. The sea also has it. Textual research: [[The History of the Six Books] Today's people in brackish water are no more than a foot long, and are fattened by pushing their heads. 〕 　 I would like to change the head of the body to the head of the body according to the original text.
鰦
